transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Ji awaz aa rahi hai sir?

Customer: Ji aa rahi hai. Namaste sir.

Executive: Mai IndiaMART se doctor se office baat kar raha hu sir.

Customer: Ye bataiye, are aapko ye complaint dalwaya tha apna.

Executive: Haan ji sir?

Customer: No requirement ka tha.

Customer: Do bar dalwaya tha.

Executive: Ki buyleads ke regarding aapne complaint dalwayi thi right?

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Sir jo aapki last complaint thi to hamari team ne aapko multiple times connect karne ki koshish kari thi sir. But aap se connect ho nahi paaye the sir. Abhi last me 7 tarikh tak aapke paas attempt kiya gaya tha humne connect karne ke liye. Kyuki aapka ek aur against complaint aayi hui hai sir. Ek Janesh se koi Janesh karke complaint hai. To inhone aapke against ek aur complaint daali hui hai. To samajhiye ki team bhi aapko contact kar rahi thi aur hamari team bhi aapko contact kar rahi thi.

Customer: Kaun tha?

Executive: Janesh karke caller se jinhone aapke against complaint raise kari hai sir.

Customer: Kya naam kya bataya aapne?

Executive: Janesh J A N E T Janesh. Unse baat ho chuka hai mera. Unka unka maine complaint solve kar liya hai. Final jo availability diya tha maine unko bola tha sabse pehle verify kar liya tha. Aur maine unko call kar liya bolte nahi hai ki unko call karke baat ban payi.

Executive: To hamari jo IndiaMART ki team hai sir ek buyer supplier concept team hoti hai sir. To wo team kya hoti hai ki aapko connect karti hai. Aapko connect karne ke baad se jo bhi issue hota hai wo discuss karke resolve karti hai. To usne bhi kai baar aapko connect kiya but I think aap busy rahe honge is wajah se aap se baat nahi ho payi thi sir. Agar aap ek baar unse baat kar lete to ye complaint bhi aapki clear ho jati.

Customer: Maine aap unki call se jab aapne bataya tha to maine bola tha ki ye baat aap kar lo. Maine uski post ko bhi pehle hi uska withdrawal ho gaya tha. Maine complaint already solve kar diya tha.

Executive: Achha sir kyuki takriban 30 October ko inhone daali thi sir complaint. To mere khayal se aapne ye 30 October hua to ye maine resolve kiya hai sir. Nahi kya aur yaad to nahi hai lekin abhi November me resolve ho gaya sir.

Executive: Achha ek baar jabse call aapka aaya tha us din aapne iska response bhi diya tha isliye maine aapko bataya tha ki ye resolve ho gaya hai.

Executive: Hamari team se Jiti Mehra ek hai jinhone aapko connect kara hua hai sir iske regarding.

Customer: Unko bol dijiye na ki ye resolve apna but jo hai na complaint hai abhi jo maine complaint dala tha iske pehle ki no requirement ka wo fir kal ek same lead aayi hai no requirement ki.

Executive: Jo buyleads ka aapne dala tha ki buyleads me aapko problem ho rahi hai right?

Customer: Haan, problem ho rahi hai.
Customer: Abhi no requirement aur no requirement ye continuously chal raha hai.

Executive: Abhi aapne aaj wahi consume kari hai aap uske bare me baat kar rahe hai?

Customer: Sorry?

Executive: Aaj aapne jo buylead consume kari hai aap uske bare me baat kar rahe hai sir?

Customer: Haan haan haan. Abhi kal jaise kal aap bata rahe the.

Executive: Abhi aapko aakhri buylead jo consume kari thi wo 17 November ko kari thi designer carpet ki Mr. Rahul ki Ghaziabad se.

Customer: Kya isi ki baat kar rahe hai aap?

Customer: Wo Banwari Banwari jo Banwari wali lead hai. Banwari wali wo lead ki baat kar rahe hai.

Executive: Ye fine carpet carpet ki hai Banwari Bhaskar buyer ka naam hai aur aapne isko 17 ko 5:30 baje consume kari thi sir.

Customer: Ji ji ji.

Customer: Aur usko maine call kiya tha to wo bol raha tha mujhe koi requirement nahi hai. Maine to usko koi call hi nahi lagaya maine koi requirement bhi nahi daali hai. Ab bataiye requirement kya hai aap bolte rahiye. Shopkeeper ka requirement hai aur requirement dala nahi hai kya iska matlab bataiye aap. Ye to seedha seedha galat lead banane ka tarika is tarah se mana jayega.

Customer: Nahi nahi aisa to nahi hai.

Executive: Aapne kabhi kuch IndiaMART pe apni requirement dali hai sir jaise aapko kisi product ki agar need ho ya aapne kuch kharida hai IndiaMART se kabhi?

Customer: Maine to abhi tak kuch kharida nahi hai. Wo aage to mai aapko bata raha hu ki agar koi shopkeeper requirement maine aapko kuch din bhi samjhaya tha aaj fir samjha raha hu. Agar kisi ka soch raha lene ka bhi thinking rahega na. Lenge lena hai agar think karega fir. To usko lena hai. Sahi me future use lena hai genuine hota hai. To wo search karega.

Customer: Uske baad wo jab search karega na agar uske related jiske paas koi jankari koi dene wala aata hai na usse thodi der to baat karega genuine hai. Aap mere se kyu baat kar rahe ho itni der se? Aapka bhi to profit hai usme?

Customer: Mai aap se kyu baat kar raha hu? Mera profit hai?

Customer: Ya koi aur sale type hai? Sir aapko problem ho rahi hai to aap usse baat kar rahe hai.

Customer: Haan.
Customer: Kabhi kabhi thinking yahi cheez chalega abhi uske baad maine ek lead generate kari thi. Ye abhi aapka ek lead hai Pushpa. Pushpa karke lead hai Alapuram ki. Aur ye lead ka ye scenario hai. Same scenario iska bhi ja raha hai isme iske baad jo hai na wahi scenario hai. Aise kaise aap itna aap hafte me 4 do aur ek lead bhi sahi se aaye na do char lead to aati nahi aur ek do lead aaye to wo bolenge hum lena nahi hai. Do teen lead call hi nahi le rahe kya matlab hua aapka yaar lead ka?

Executive: Ji mai aapko ek kaam karta hu aap mujhe wo buyleads jo aapne consume kari hui hai sir to mai aapko ek baar WhatsApp pe message kar raha hu. Aap mujhe us particular buylead ki detail bhejiye mai yaha pe internal team me ek baar mail bhej kar raha hu ki us buylead ka kya scenario hai. Aur aapko ek cheez aur bhi last time batayi thi sir ki aap ek baar jab buylead consume kiya kijiye to thoda sa ek waqt ka waha pe dhyan diya kijiye sir ki jaise jo buylead abhi post hui hai usme time likha rehta hai sir. Ki jaise main aapko mere bhai aap itna time hi dekho mai aapko jyadatar ye lead kabhi pata nahi mere paas nahi dikh rahi hai. Jab ya to mere paas 40 ya to 45 lead hai ya ek ban ke hai. Kuch lead aisi hai jaise raat me generate hui hai. Ab raat me 12:00 baje ya 11:30 baje maine nahi dekha. 11:30 baje generate hui hai. To mai subah uthunga to 7-8 ghanta waise hi time lost ho gaya isme.

Executive: Ji ji ji.

Customer: To wo lead agar uth rahi hai to koi issue nahi hai usme. Nahi to koi problem nahi hai.

Customer: Aap kaise mobile se use karti hai ki laptop se?
Customer: Aap subah WhatsApp pe hello mai aapko WhatsApp kare aur aap iska detail nikal ke mujhe bhej paati hai samajh me aa rahi hai. Nahi to fir hame loge hame forward isko lena padega dikkat ho jayegi. Mai mail kar dunga fir.

Customer: Aap mujhe ek baar aap mujhe ek baar ek baar mai ek baar complaint leke aaya hu ye teesra chautha baar mera complaint hai samajh me nahi aa raha.

Executive: Thik hai.

Executive: Aap mujhe ek baar buylead ki detail bhejiye aur aapki buyer se jo baat hui hai wo detail bhejiye dono details mujhe recording bhi bhejiye mai yaha pe aapko recording karta hu.

Customer: Aap abhi call karwaiye aap isko check karwaiye baat kariye kaise dala hai kyu dala hai. Kisne dala hai. Aise lead kaise generate ho rahi hai hamari. Koi lead banmani iske lead generate kar raha hai kya hai. Dikkate to thoda dekh chalo ek aadha hota to chalo thik hai hum samajh lenge. But continuously har ye ho raha hai abhi. Mai aapko kam se kam to 4-5 baar call karke yahi scenario de raha hu.

Executive: Ji ji.

Executive: Nahi ye to thik hai mai aap mujhe bhejiye na to mai ek baar internal team me dekhungi.
summary:
Concerns:

- Facing issues with irrelevant buyleads.

- Expressed frustration with continuous irrelevant leads.

- Dissatisfied with the quality of leads received.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to investigate buylead issue.

- Executive requested details of consumed buyleads via WhatsApp.

- Executive will forward details to internal team.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send buylead details and buyer conversation.



Alert (If Any):

complaint

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, complaints, lead quality, resolution
